name.description: A user-supplied name for the GraphqlApi.

log_config.description: Nested argument containing logging configuration. Defined below.

openid_connect_config.description: Nested argument containing OpenID Connect configuration. Defined below.

user_pool_config.description: The Amazon Cognito User Pool configuration. Defined below.

schema.description: The schema definition, in GraphQL schema language format. Terraform cannot perform drift detection of this configuration.

additional_authentication_provider.description: One or more additional authentication providers for the GraphqlApi. Defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

xray_enabled.description: Whether tracing with X-ray is enabled. Defaults to false.

uris.description: Map of URIs associated with the API. e.g. `uris["GRAPHQL"] = https://ID.appsync-api.REGION.amazonaws.com/graphql`
